title: #90: Discussing Manhunt: Unabomber with Jim Fitzgerald
description:
The RCP Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) welcome back friend of the podcast and former FBI agent Jim Fitzgerald to discuss his new Discovery Channel miniseries "Manhunt: Unabomber". The series dramatized Fitz's role in tracking down and catching the notorious mad bomber.


New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime


Watch Manhunt: Unabomber , a New Discovery Original Series

Discovery.com/Manhunt


Listen to Locked Up Abroad, the new Wondery podcast featuring Jim Clemente
